question: India's first Ro-Ro (Roll-on/Roll-off) service was launched at which of the following ports?
explanation: India's first Ro-Ro (Roll-on/Roll-off) service was launched at New Mangalore Port on Oct 20, but has been temporarily. The Pure Car & Truck Carrier (PCTC) MV Maria India is a 160-metre long Ro-Ro ship with a capacity to carry up to 150 loaded trucks and 210 cars.
